Package UserInterface

Class CinemaUI

java.lang.Object
UserInterface.CinemaUI
public class CinemaUI extends Object
This is the Cinema Interface. Imported to call User interface to allow editing the showtime.

  • Constructor Details

    • CinemaUI

      public CinemaUI()

  • Method Details

    • UserInterface

      public static void UserInterface(AllCineplex cineplexes, int choice, Movie movie) throws IOException
      This is the UserInterface. This allows the user to edit /add/update any showtime for any movie by accessing the cineplexes and each cinema in them and the movies that are showing at the cinemas
      Parameters:
      cineplexes - = stores the list of movies and the showtimes and showdates of the movies listed in the cinemas
      Throws:
      IOException - is thrown if there is an error in accessing the data from the cineplexes

    • addNewShowTimeUI

      public static void addNewShowTimeUI(AllCineplex cineplexes, Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method adds new ShowTimes to each cinema that each cineplex has. This is used right after a new movie has been created. User MUST create new ShowTime for all cinemas.
      Parameters:
      cineplexes - - Update new ShowTime in global storage.
      Throws:
      IOException - - To check if ShowTime can be written into text file.

    • UpdateShowTimeUI

      public static void UpdateShowTimeUI(AllCineplex cineplexes, Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method edits the current available ShowTime selected by user.
      Parameters:
      cineplexes - is passed into the method to update the global list of movies used by the app.
      Throws:
      IOException - is used when updating the database.

    • removeShowTimeUI

      public static void removeShowTimeUI(AllCineplex cineplexes) throws IOException
      This method is used to remove Show Times in selected Cineplex's Cinema.
      Parameters:
      cineplexes - - Used to update global list of ShowTime.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Checks if Cineplex's / Cinema's ShowTime database is empty.
